property.value: The game starts with a cat looking child waking up in some place they don't know and asking if anyone is here. Your goal is to guide them and ensure their safety.

properties.property:
''A tall, rectangular panel of wood is set into the wall. It appears to be a door with no hinge and no handle.'' ''No amount of force can make it budge, either.'' ''A strange, somewhat circular symbol is carved into a central recess, roughly at eye level.''
If the [[lightbulb]] is used on it the lightbulb shaped hole emits a flash of light and then Niko gets teleported to [[Barrens]] and their sprites change slightly. Key presses are needed to advance the cutscene.

properties.property:
After you recieve the message about you "having only one shot", you can kill [[Niko]] and get the "bad ending" by quitting the game not by using a few select beds or by pressing the f12 key. The "bad ending" cutscene happens in this very room.
The current patch of the game allows replaying the game from the start after the "bad ending" where the v1.0 deleted itself and prevented you from replaying ever again by using the regsitry values and marking itself as malware.
